definitions.definition: A large Arctic marine mammal related to seals and having long tusks , tough, wrinkled skin, and four flippers , Odobenus rosmarus .
A man with a walrus moustache .

main_definition: A large Arctic marine mammal related to seals and having long tusks , tough, wrinkled skin, and four flippers , Odobenus rosmarus .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , sometimes derogatory ) A man with a walrus moustache .
